## Background:
The GRE (Graduate Record Examination) and GMAT (Graduate Management Admission Test) are standardized tests that assess the verbal, mathematical, and analytical writing skills of students applying for graduate programs in universities and business schools respectively. The math section of both exams evaluates a candidate's quantitative reasoning and problem-solving abilities. 

## Revised Instruction:
